typeDescriptions.typeString: struct CadenceRandomConsumer.Request storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct CadenceRandomConsumer.Request storage ref[] storage pointer,struct CadenceRandomConsumer.Request storage ref)

documentation.text:
@dev This method serves as the commit step in this contract's commit-reveal scheme
 Here a caller places commits at Flow block n to reveal a random number at >= block n+1
 This is because the random source for a Flow block is not available until after the finalization of that block.
 Implementing contracts may wish to affiliate the request ID with the caller's address or some other identifier
 so the relevant request can be fulfilled.
 Emits a {RandomnessRequested} event.
 @return requestId The ID of the request.

@dev This contract is a simple coin toss game where users can place win prizes by flipping a coin as a demonstration
 of safe usage of Flow EVM's native secure randomness.

randomness.","kind":"dev","methods":{"_requestRandomness()":{"details":"This method serves as the commit step in this contract's commit-reveal scheme Here a caller places commits at Flow block n to
